Type.Name: HTMLCommandType
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Enumeration of commands that knows how to respond to.
Undo the last command
Redo the last un-done command.
Copy the current selection.
Copy the current selection and make further selection impossible.
Cut the current selection.
Paste the current clipboard contents.
Cut the current line to the clipboard.
Insert a new paragraph at the cursor location.
Insert a tab character.
Insert a rule line.
Insert parameters for a rule line.
Insert parameters for an image.
Add a new tab or increase the current indent level.
Insert a new tab or go to the next table in a cell.
Create a new link.
Remove an existing link.
Delete text.
Delete the character before the cursor.
Delete the character before the cursor or remove an indent level.
Go into selection mode.
Disable selections.
Make text bold.
Make text non-bold.
Toggle the bold style for a character or region.
Make text italic.
Make text non-italic.
Toggle the italic attribute for a character or block of text.
Make text underlined.
Make text non-underlined.
Toggle the underline attribute on a character or block of text.
Strike out text.
Remove strikeouts from text.
Toggle the strikeout attribute on a character or block of text.
Sets text to the smallest size.
Sets text to the second-smallest size.
Sets text to normal size.
Sets text to a medium-large size.
Sets text to a large size.
Sets text to a very large size.
Sets text to the largest possible size.
Makes text one size larger.
Makes text one size smaller.
Left-aligns text.
Center-aligns text.
Right-aligns text.
Clears indent values on text.
Indents text one level.
Indents text one level or moves it to the next cell in a table.
De-indents text.
Goes to the previous cell in a table.
Indents an entire paragraph.
Adds a new linebreak and re-flows text appropriately.
Adds a new space and re-flows text appropriately.
Sets the style of this paragraph to normal.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML H1 element.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML H2 element.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML H3 element.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML H4 element.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML H5 element.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML H6 element.
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML <address> element.
Sets this paragraph to be preformatted (i.e. fixed-width with carriage returns being significant).
Sets this paragraph to be an HTML <LI> item.
Sets this paragraph to be part of a sequentially-Roman-numeral-numbered list.
Sets this paragraph to be part of a sequentially-numbered list.
Sets this paragraph to be part of a sequentially-alphabetically-numbered list ("a. Item one; b. Item two; c. Item three.")
Extends the current selection up.
Extends the current selection down.
Extends the current selection to the left.
Extends the current selection to the right.
Extends the current selection by one page upwards.
Extends the current selection by one page downwards.
Extends the current selection to the beginning of the line.
Extends the current selection to the end of the line.
Extend the selection to the beginning of the document.
Extend the selection to the end of the document.
Extend the selection to include the previous word.
Extend the selection to include the next word.
Capitalize the current word.
Turns this word into all-upper-case.
Turns this word into all-lower-case.
Suggest a spelling for the current (misspelled) word.
Add this word to the user's personal spellchecker dictionary.
Add this word to the spellchecker dictionary for this session, so that it doesn't show up as misspelled.
Search the widget for a given term.
Incremental search forward.
Incremental search backward.
Search the text using a regular expression.
Move focus forward one widget.
Move focus backward one widget.
Popup the context menu.
Pop up the properties dialog.
Move the cursor forward.
Move the cursor backward.
Insert a table with empty text, one row, and one column.
Insert a table column after the current one.
Insert a table column before the current one.
Insert a table row after the current one.
Insert a table row before the current one.
Delete a table column.
Delete a row from the current table.
Widen/increase the COLSPAN attribute for a table cell.
Narrow/decrease the COLSPAN attribute for a table cell.
Increase the ROWSPAN attribute for a table cell.
Decrease the ROWSPAN attribute for a table cell.
Join this table cell with one to its left.
Join this table cell with one to its right.
Join this table cell with one above it.
Join this table cell with one below it.
Make the borders of this table wider.
Make the borders of this table narrower.
Make the borders of this table zero.
Set the default color of text.
Select the current word.
Select the current line.
Select the current paragraph.
Select a paragraph or more.
Select all of this document.
Save the cursor's current position to the cursor position stack.
Restores a cursor position that was saved to the cursor position stack.
Move the cursor to the beginning of the document.
Move the cursor to the end of the document.
Stops the widget from redrawing.
Allows the widget to redraw.
Magnify the text.
Make the text display size smaller.
Reset the zoom level to normal size text.
Increase the spacing between table cells.
Decrease the spacing between table cells.
Make the spacing between table cells zero.
Increase the padding between table cells.
Decrease the padding between table cells.
Set the padding between table cells to zero.
Delete an entire table.
Delete a row from a table.
Delete a column from a table.
Clear the contents of a table cell.
Grab the keyboard focus.
Deletes a word.
Deletes the word before the cursor.
Apply a certain color to a text selection.
Turn data-saving on.
Turn data-saving off.
Whether this data has been saved since the last change.
Whether this data has been saved since the last change.
Go to the beginning of the document.
Go to the end of the document.
Increase the COLSPAN value of a table cell.
Increase the ROWSPAN value of a table cell.
Decrease the COLSPAN attribute of a cell.
Decrease the ROWSPAN attribute of a cell.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
